title: Elegant Emerald Polki Jhumka - Jadau Chandbali
materials: South Sea Pearls. Exhibits a rich Hyderabadi Polki setting with traditional craftsmanship.
features: Classic chandbali design with a central Polki setting surrounded by vibrant green emeralds. Features cascading South Sea pearl drops for added elegance. Traditional Jadau craftsmanship evident in the meticulous setting of the stones. The Jhumka showcases a unique flower design at the top with a teardrop emerald as the center.
occasions: festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranthi
as well as traditional South Indian ceremonies such as Seemantham (baby shower) and Half-Saree function.
description: This earring is a fusion of timeless elegance and traditional craftsmanship. The Polki diamonds provide a raw, uncut brilliance, beautifully complemented by the vibrant emeralds and lustrous pearls. The jadau work exemplifies the rich heritage of Hyderabad's jewelry tradition, making it a truly unique and cherished piece. A statement piece that represents elegance and cultural heritage.
